name: My first day in the agency
name_original: My first day in the agency
description:
My first day in the agency

Help Pollo to complete its first infiltration mission on the agency. Be aware of his needs for Hunger and Baddler because a low level on them will affect him.

- Use W, A, S and D (or the arrow keys) to move Pollo.
- If Hunger gets to its low level, Pollo may not walk or its speed will vary.
- If Baddler gets to its low level, Pollo will leave a trail of pee on the floor.

- Use  (the snacks machine) to satisfy hunger.

- Use  (the rest room) to satisfy baddler.

- Pick all the  (documents) and then go to  (the exit)  to complete the mission.

- Pollo will fail the mission if he or his pee is saw by the guards.
